results.definition: a wild and uninhabited area left in its natural condition
examples: it was a wilderness preserved for the hawks and mountaineers
the duties of citizenship are lost sight of in the wilderness of interests of individuals and groups
a wilderness of masts in the harbor

results.definition: a wooded region in northeastern Virginia near Spotsylvania where bloody but inconclusive battles were fought in the American Civil War

examples: he led the Democratic party back from the wilderness
